column1: The Purple Pig////We also tried the pigs ear
column2: octopus and broccoli. The pigs ear was my second favorite. The strips were crispy tasty little treats that complemented the sunny side egg well. The octopus was tossed in a great seasoning that tasted delightful. The only let down was the broccoli. It tasted as if it was fried in old oil
column3: the flavor was off and the quality of the dish was not comparable to the others.
